name: Ehab Elkady
title: DPT
bio: Ehab Elkady, DPT is a highly experienced physical therapist with over 20 years of dedication to improving patient outcomes through innovative physical therapy techniques.
With a Doctor of Physical Therapy (DPT) degree and decades of hands-on experience, Ehab has developed a deep understanding of the human body and its capacity for healing.
He utilizes a holistic approach that blends traditional physical therapy with modern modifications tailored to each patient’s unique needs.

sections.heading: Specializations:
list: Chronic pain management and mobility issues
Sports injuries rehabilitation
Post-surgical rehabilitation

sections.heading: Approach:
list: Personalized care with sustainable treatment plans
Holistic blend of traditional and modern therapy
Focus on long-term health and wellness

conclusion: Throughout his career, Ehab has earned a reputation for his dedication to patient care, adaptability in treatment plans, and commitment to staying at the forefront of physical therapy advancements.

name: Elhussein Ahmed
title: DPT
bio: Dr. Elhussein Ahmed is a New York-based physical therapist with 12 years of experience.
He graduated in 2008 and specializes in the evaluation and treatment of individuals suffering from health problems caused by injury or disease.
His expertise lies in assessing joint motion, muscle strength and endurance, cardiovascular function, and performance in daily activities.

sections.heading: Dr. Ahmed's treatment approach includes:
list: Therapeutic Exercises: Targeted exercise programs to restore function, improve mobility, and strengthen muscles.
Cardiovascular Endurance Training: Exercises to improve heart and lung function.
Training in Activities of Daily Living (ADLs): Guidance on performing daily activities like walking, dressing, and cooking.

sections.heading: He employs a range of modalities such as:
list: Light, Heat, Cold Therapy for pain relief and healing
Hydrotherapy for rehabilitation
Electrical Stimulation and Massage to improve circulation and muscle function

conclusion: Dr. Ahmed is committed to developing personalized treatment plans based on each patient's strengths, weaknesses, and functional goals, helping them regain independence and enhance their quality of life.

name: Sherif Sobh
title: Exercise Physiologist
bio: Sherif Sobh is a highly skilled Exercise Physiologist with 20 years of experience in the science of human movement, exercise, and rehabilitation.
His expertise covers clinical rehabilitation, chronic disease management, sports performance enhancement, and general fitness.
Throughout his career, Sherif has worked in hospitals, rehabilitation centers, and sports facilities, designing and delivering evidence-based exercise programs tailored to each individual’s needs.

sections.heading: Expertise:
list: Clinical rehabilitation and chronic disease management
Sports performance enhancement
General fitness and lifestyle improvement

sections.heading: Approach:
list: Health and fitness assessments
Safe and effective evidence-based training plans
Education on lifestyle strategies for long-term wellness

conclusion: By combining scientific knowledge of human physiology and biomechanics with practical application, Sherif has helped patients recover from injuries, manage chronic conditions, and optimize athletic performance.

name: Alhassan Ahmed
title: PT, MSc
bio: Dr. Alhassan Ahmed is a physical therapist with a master’s degree in rehabilitation sciences.
He specializes in neurological rehabilitation and pediatric therapy, bringing advanced techniques to help patients with complex conditions.
With years of clinical experience, he has supported patients of all ages to achieve functional independence and improved quality of life.

sections.heading: Focus Areas:
list: Neurological rehabilitation (stroke, spinal cord injury, MS, etc.)
Pediatric physical therapy
Functional mobility improvement

sections.heading: Methods of Care:
list: Task-oriented training
Balance and coordination therapy
Hydrotherapy for neurological patients
Family education and home program design

conclusion: Dr. Alhassan is passionate about helping patients of all ages improve their mobility and achieve greater independence through evidence-based rehabilitation practices.
